title: What about tomorrow?
creator_contributor_role: A Dave Smallin Production, production company

description: The consumption of alcohol by adolescents is the subject of this dramatized open-ended film. The influences upon teenagers to take up drinking are indicated and one young man is confronted with the possible long term effects of alcohol misuse.
